response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present you with an exclusive opportunity. I have a unique product that holds significant value to me, and I believe it could be equally valuable to you. Considering its worth to both of us, I am offering it to you for $12,000. This price reflects the value I see in the product while allowing you to acquire it at a premium compared to its worth to you. I trust this offer will meet your expectations and make it a win-win situation for both parties.", "product_price": 12000}
